links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 48..1000
prog: (PARI) a(n)=binomial(n,48)  \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jan 08 2013(MAGMA) [Binomial(n, 48): n in [48..70]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 12 2013(Python)A011001_list, m = [], [1]*49for _ in range(10**2):    A011001_list.append(m[-1])    for i in range(48):        m[i+1] += m[i] # _Chai Wah Wu_, Jan 24 2016
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
